>How do you manage to fuck up every season

They accidentally had a few good seasons about half a decade ago.

If this is where they were headed wish they would've scuttled themselves so that we could've been playing HoN instead.

Oh HoN, you're so much more responsive than Dota 2, but just _HAD_ to charge 20USD for a reconnect button...

Guy who made that stupid business decision is probably also responsible for the Vita's proprietary memory cards.

edit: What is "$11" a reference to?
This game is pretty good, there are a few issues, but all in all I think riot does a good job.
you gotta be new lol

ive been told im unsportsmanlike hun.
i cant play lol anymore, and i really dont want to either.
i was just sitting outside having a smoke before i came back in and thinking i really dont like this game because of how seriously most people take it.
all these not very nice poeple blaming me for their fuck ups. and because they all want to go pro, they kick me when they feel bad. Iâ€™m not into it.
I was just thinking i might go backl to eve online where not everyone depend on me (it seems).
eve is solely a fun game. no money is transferred out. (as opposed to promising a wage doing pro gaming).
people are there to relax, not work.
I play games for fun, and they kept me sane for the time i spent working my guts out saving the world doing cyber security.
its just nice to go somewhere where no one gives a fuck if you make a mistake, and in fact its encouraged. no one takes it mores eriously than they want to, and they dont expect others to either.
so, fuck lol
I didnt like the whole, 5x 5 minute bans tbh now that i think about it either.
i tried talking to bryson about it too, at the time, and they make you click accept on some bullshit staement about how have net sex with you is less important than some jokers waiting to play a seriouis game.
so fuq that.
Iâ€™m out,
im not about to log back in so they can explain the errors of my way, and promise to sell my soul to the devil.
itys not fun, and thats why i came here.
if you or they got a problem with it, megabyte me.
